channel.title: DOMO
channel.description: A Journal exploring the boundaries between virtual and physical life.

item.title: Stardew Valley: The Design of Slow Life
item.description: Reseña sobre el proceso de diseño y desarrollo del videojuego Stardew Valley

item.title: Itch.io: The New Geography
item.description: "The Indie Underground: A global community of creators where the most unique, experimental, and hand-crafted games find their home."

item.title: GameAwards 2026
Blasphemous
item.description: "After its long-awaited release, Grand Theft Auto VI is expected to be the center of gravity for the 2026 ceremony. All eyes will be on whether Rockstar Games can secure a historic Game of the Year sweep or if a daring indie underdog will pull off the ultimate upset."

item.title: Blasphemous: Sacred Art
item.description: "Penance Never Ends: A twisted journey through a world of nightmare religion and brutal beauty."
